Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply.  I am glad that the joint pain is better; I am really looking forward to that.  I sleep with the window open and the ceiling fan going; until hubby turns it off cause he gets cold. Happy Day toyou,  Paula V 62
Posts.Title: Hot Flashes AFTER Femara?

Posts.Content: 5 years on Femara and now that I am off it I am having Hot Flashes..... how are you doing?
Posts.Title: Hot Flashes AFTER Femara?

Posts.Content: Good Morning, first let me say that I am sorry for your diagnoses and the her2/neu protein.  I also had her2/neu breast cancer and am 6 years cancer free.  I had chemo, radiation, herceptin (for 1 year) and Femara for 5 years.  This diagnoses is NOT a death sentence.  My cousin also was diagnosed stage 4 her2/neu and continued on with chemo, radiation and Femara.  She is now 3 years clean.  The Herceptin (for me) had no side effects and was glad that this treatment was available as it was not a year before my diagnoses.   I hope that you are doing well since your post of 09-12-2014.
Posts.Title: HER2/Neu protein positive breast cancer
